Detailed Description

Resistive divider used for measuring temperature.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ TS_VISHAY_NTCLE317E4103SBA_POSITION_IN_RESISTOR_DIVIDER_IS_R_1

#define TS_VISHAY_NTCLE317E4103SBA_POSITION_IN_RESISTOR_DIVIDER_IS_R_1   (false)

Position of the NTC in the voltage resistor true: NTC is positioned above the voltage tap for the ADC voltage. This equals resistor R_1 in the above circuit diagram

false: NTC is positioned below the voltage tap for the ADC voltage. This equals resistor R_2 in the above circuit diagram

Definition at line 90 of file vishay_ntcle317e4103sba.h.

◆ TS_VISHAY_NTCLE317E4103SBA_RESISTOR_DIVIDER_RESISTANCE_R_1_R_2_Ohm

#define TS_VISHAY_NTCLE317E4103SBA_RESISTOR_DIVIDER_RESISTANCE_R_1_R_2_Ohm   (10000.0f)

Resistance value of the other resistor (not the NTC) in the resistor divider in Ohm.

Definition at line 99 of file vishay_ntcle317e4103sba.h.

◆ TS_VISHAY_NTCLE317E4103SBA_RESISTOR_DIVIDER_SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_V

#define TS_VISHAY_NTCLE317E4103SBA_RESISTOR_DIVIDER_SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_V   (3.0f)

Resistor divider supply voltage in volt

Definition at line 93 of file vishay_ntcle317e4103sba.h.

Function Documentation

◆ TS_Vis01GetTemperatureFromLut()

int16_t TS_Vis01GetTemperatureFromLut ( uint16_t  adcVoltage_mV)

returns temperature based on measured ADC voltage.

Parameters
adcVoltage_mVvoltage in mV
Returns
corresponding temperature in deci °C or INT16_MAX/INT16_MIN if NTC is shorted or got disconnected. The caller of this functions needs to check for these return values to prevent invalid data.
